thread.title: Buffalo Bills vs. Jacksonville Jaguars Yahoo live stream, live score updates: NFL morning game in London
thread.title_full: Buffalo Bills vs. Jacksonville Jaguars Yahoo live stream, live score updates: NFL morning game in London

author: Nick O'Malley | nomalley@masslive.com
title: Buffalo Bills vs. Jacksonville Jaguars Yahoo live stream, live score updates: NFL morning game in London
text:
TV : None 
Broadcast Crew 
While the game will be online-only for virtually all of the game's audience, the broadcast will be produced by a standard CBS crew. 
Channel Info 
None -- unless you live in Buffalo or Jacksonville. 
Live Stream Info 
Yahoo Live Stream -- The only option these week. Fortunately, Yahoo's set up an entire independent website for the broadcast. You can also set up the broadcast to stream on most streaming devices (iOS, Android, Roku, XBox, etc.). 
Associated Press Preview 
BUFFALO (3-3) at JACKSONVILLE (1-5) 
Sunday, 9:30 a.m. ET, Yahoo! 
OPENING LINE — Bills by 3 ½ 
RECORD VS. SPREAD — Bills 2-3-1, Jaguars 2-4 
SERIES RECORD — Bills lead 7-6 
LAST MEETING — Bills beat Jaguars 27-20, Dec. 15, 2013 
LAST WEEK — Bills lost to Bengals 34-21; Jaguars lost to Texans 31-20 
AP PRO32 RANKING — Bills No. 14, Jaguars No. 32 
BILLS OFFENSE — OVERALL (27), RUSH (7), PASS (28) 
BILLS DEFENSE — OVERALL (18), RUSH (4), PASS (21) 
JAGUARS OFFENSE — OVERALL (16), RUSH (24), PASS (12) 
JAGUARS DEFENSE — OVERALL (19), RUSH (14), PASS (23) 
STREAKS, STATS AND NOTES — Early kickoff and first NFL game streamed lived solely on digital platforms except in Jacksonville and Buffalo regions. It can be seen online at https:nflstream.yahoo.com. It also can be found on Amazon Fire TV, AppleTV, ChromeCast, Roku, Samsung, TiVo, Vizio P-Series and XBOX 360 and XBOX One. ... Bills have alternated wins and losses through six games, and if that trend continues, this would be a victory. ... Bills have some significant injuries: QB Tyrod Taylor will miss second straight game because of sprained ligament in left knee. Veteran DT Kyle Williams (knee) is out. WR Percy Harvin (hip/personal issue) and RB Karlos Williams (concussion) didn't make trip, OT Seantrel Henderson remains in league's concussion protocol, and WR Sammie Watkins (ankle) arrived in London wearing walking boot and won't play. RB LeSean McCoy is hoping to play through nagging hamstring injury. ... Former Bills coach Doug Marrone, who resigned in December and landed in Jacksonville three weeks later as offensive line coach, faces former team for first time. ... Jaguars could be without RB T.J. Yeldon (groin) for second consecutive week. ... Jaguars playing third consecutive game in London and signed extension to play at Wembley Stadium through 2020. ... Jaguars are 0-2 across pond, losing both games by combined score of 73-27. They changed up schedule this year, flying over after practice Thursday in hopes of treating it more like West Coast trip. ... Fantasy Tip: Take chance on Bills WR Robert Woods, who could be top target with Watkins out and Marquise Goodwin (ribs) now on injured reserve.
